version_description: More Games Added. Have a Match!
Avoid the Rolling Logs! Enjoy the New Party Game!

Avoid the Rolling Logs! Enjoy the New Party Game!
Minor bug fixed.

Daily Quest is renewed!
Complete Quests every day & Earn Full Rewards.
Make Yours! Create a cool video with the new AR Camera!
bug fix.

Now Time to Post on ZEPETO!
Upload a post and share it with friends

Now Time to Post on ZEPETO!
Upload a post and share it with friends.

Customizable Maps are open in ZEPETO WORLD.
Experience diverse Maps created by ZEPETO users.

Customizable Maps are open in ZEPETO WORLD.
Experience diverse Maps created by ZEPETO users.

There are new features added to ZEPETO.
- Create & characters more easily.
- When you chat in World, enjoy the vertical screen.
- Reject 'message requests' from strangers.

There are new features added in ZEPETO.

- When you chat in World, enjoy the vertical screen.
- Reject message requests from unknown users.

Play more with your friends!
- When you comment, mention a friend!
- Chat by sharing Posts, Pictures, and Videos.

- You can now see more detailed information about posts posted by friends and followers. Wonder in which world this picture was taken? Let's visit it together!
- You have been waiting for a long time! ZEPETO now supports the languages Spanish, Italian, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, and Portuguese.

*Some information is provided in English

- A new way to get ZEMs?! Check out 'LUCKY.'
- It's now easier to find the fashion you want. Search for items like 'dress', 'high heel', or 'retro'!

- facebook login bug fixed.

There's more ways to play
- Try 'Action' mode in Camera and add your own facial expressions to your dancing ZEPETO
- How are other people styling this shirt? Click the item in Shop, and check out the information
- You can choose whether to show your following/follower list to others.
